text: Phouoibi Shayon is a 2017 Indian Meitei language mythological feature film. It is directed by Oinam Samananda and produced under the collaboration of the Kanglei Movies World and Sergey Film Production. The story is about the mythology of Phouoibi and her sister goddesses, being sent down to earth to prosper the human civilization. ==References== == Other websites == * Phouoibi_Shayon_release_info_klmdb.com * Phouoibi_Shayon_klmdb.com Category:Meitei-language movies
title: Phouoibi Shayon
